title: Find a Cure
tags: how to unlock find a cure
content:
e options to choose from:

No, you've lost me. No idea what you're talking about. If that was any of your business, we'd have called you over. We were just discussing the next steps.

She'll then say that she would be careful with Gale upon choosing the third option. Your next set of choices will look like this:

You don't trust Gale? You like to stir things up, don't you? Stop looking for trouble and stay focused. I wasn't confiding in anyone. I was just talking. If anyone has me concerned, it'
